channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Nina Leonard
channel.desc: A collection of beautifully designed and elegant knitwear dresses, skirts and sweaters with co-ordinated accessories.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Blowfish Malibu Footwear
channel.desc: Discover a varied range of sandals, wedges and trainers with a laid-back aesthetic. Blowfish gives us a Malibu-inspired story with eco-friendly product at affordable prices.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion on Friday with Julia
channel.desc: Offering great colours, quality fabrics and exciting fashion designs for every woman. Treat yourself and go shopping with Julia Roberts.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Radley London
channel.desc: Radley fashion accessories provide an aspirational mix of style, attention to detail and desirability, offering designs for every occasion that make you look and feel fabulous.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Dune London Footwear
channel.desc: Starting on London's Oxford Street in 1992, Dune is an influential, dynamic and internationally-renowned footwear and accessories brand, with London heritage at the heart of what they do.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ben de Lisi
channel.desc: Ben de Lisi is bringing his gorgeous fashion aesthetic to QVC UK. With a focus on beautiful fabrics and innovative design, Ben's distinctive look is the epitome of modern elegance.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Nina Leonard
channel.desc: A collection of beautifully designed and elegant knitwear dresses, skirts and sweaters with co-ordinated accessories.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Blowfish Malibu Footwear
channel.desc: Discover a varied range of sandals, wedges and trainers with a laid-back aesthetic. Blowfish gives us a Malibu-inspired story with eco-friendly product at affordable prices.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion on Friday with Julia
channel.desc: Offering great colours, quality fabrics and exciting fashion designs for every woman. Treat yourself and go shopping with Julia Roberts.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Stylish Gifts for Men
channel.desc: Treat the men in your life to the perfect gift from our carefully chosen selection of stylish apparel, accessories and more.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Dannii Minogue Fashion
channel.desc: Discover fashion to flatter your shape with Dannii Minogue's beautiful range of on-trend styles, which offers a full spectrum of petite and regular sizes designed to help you find your perfect fit.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Rieker Footwear
channel.desc: Rieker offers footwear designed to be flexible, roomy, light and well cushioned. Following trends in the marketplace, Rieker provides classic footwear to women of all ages.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ben de Lisi
channel.desc: Ben de Lisi is bringing his gorgeous fashion aesthetic to QVC UK. With a focus on beautiful fabrics and innovative design, Ben's distinctive look is the epitome of modern elegance.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Malissa J Collection
channel.desc: Discover the Malissa J Collection and indulge in fashion and accessories that boast the latest trends, exceptional quality, and chic, versatile day-to-night designs offered at affordable prices.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: The Fashion Edit with Farah
channel.desc: The Fashion Edit with Farah.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: In the Garden with Thompson & Morgan
channel.desc: Enjoy gorgeous plants and flowers in your garden from Thompson & Morgan, one of the UK's oldest horticulture firms and an established household name for gardeners across the country.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Garden Inspirations
channel.desc: Garden Inspirations.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Malissa J Collection
channel.desc: Discover the Malissa J Collection and indulge in fashion and accessories that boast the latest trends, exceptional quality, and chic, versatile day-to-night designs offered at affordable prices.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: The Fashion Edit with Farah
channel.desc: The Fashion Edit with Farah.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% off Frank Usher Sale
channel.desc: Up to 50% off Frank Usher Sale.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% Off Fashion
channel.desc: Fill your wardrobe with gorgeous fashion from a host of big names, and save up to 50.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Summer Sandals on 4 Easy Pay
channel.desc: Spread the cost of summer sandals in 4 interest-free instalments. From strappy sandals to slides and mules, find everything you need to stay stylish and on-trend this season.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: My Garden Stories
channel.desc: Style your garden with the help of My Garden Stories, offering an incredible range of outdoor furniture, planters and sculptures to make your space your very own.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Hayloft Plants
channel.desc: Discover an exciting range or rare, unusual, exciting, and most of all beautiful plants that will bring an abundance of charm and colour to your outdoor space.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Vionic Footwear with FMT Technology
channel.desc: A fashionable and comfortable footwear range with biomechanically-designed orthotic technology, which helps restore natural foot function and promote well-being with every step.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Izabel London Fashion
channel.desc: Discover fashion from Izabel London. This inclusive brand caters to sizes 8 - 26 and features designs for the trend-conscious fashion fan shopping for everything from everyday style to holiday looks.
